verbs.description: [ARG0: son daughter] [V: oppose] [ARG1: father election] [ARGM-DIR: to missouri house] the son and daughter of a missouri house candidate are urging people not to vote for him because he regularly espouses racial and homophobic views and dislikes jews and muslims steve west 64 gained attention after winning the august republican primary for a northwest missouri house seat when word spread about views he frequently expressed on a radio show i ca n't imagine him being in any level of government his daughter emily west told the kansas city star on monday karen aroesty missouri house rep jon carpenter pittsburgh andrew west jack justice assault mo steve west the kansas city star america missouri republican party liberty kansas city star andy west missouri clay county
